    io.helidon.messaging.connectors.kafka
    Microprofile messaging Kafka connector.

      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.batchSize​(int batchSize)
      The producer will attempt to batch records together into fewer requests whenever multiple records are being sent to the same partition.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.bootstrapServers​(String servers)
      A list of host/port pairs to use for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.bufferMemory​(long bufferMemory)
      The total bytes of memory the producer can use to buffer records waiting to be sent to the server.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.compressionType​(String compressionType)
      The compression type for all data generated by the producer.
      static KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConnector.configBuilder()
      Custom config builder for Kafka connector.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.enableAutoCommit​(boolean enableAutoCommit)
      If true the consumer's offset will be periodically committed in the background.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.groupId​(String groupId)
      A unique string that identifies the consumer group this consumer belongs to.

      Add custom property.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.retries​(int retries)
      Setting a value greater than zero will cause the client to resend any record whose send fails with a potentially transient error.
      KafkaConfigBuilder KafkaConfigBuilder.topic​(String... topics)
      Names of the topics to consume from.
